description: Presents content at the extreme ends of a spectrum, showing both a radical, ambitious, or maximalist version alongside a minimal, conservative, or basic version. This decorator helps explore the range of possibilities from the simplest implementation to the most expansive vision.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: The specific dimension along which to explore extremes (e.g., 'cost', 'time', 'ambition', 'complexity')

parameters.name: compare
parameters.description: Whether to include a comparative analysis of the extreme versions

examples.description: Basic exploration of minimal and radical approaches
examples.usage:
+++Extremes
Describe a strategy for reducing carbon emissions.
examples.result: Presents both a minimal, immediately achievable carbon reduction strategy and a radical, transformative approach, with a comparison of their respective impacts, feasibility, and trade-offs

examples.description: Only radical version along a specific dimension
examples.usage:
+++Extremes(versions=radical, dimension=technological innovation, compare=false)
Outline the future of transportation.
examples.result: Provides only a technologically radical vision of transportation's future, focusing on the most innovative and disruptive possibilities without comparison to other approaches
